item.title: ECOM7123 Building a Resilient, Healthy and Safe Community
item.description: Overview Basic concepts resilient city resilience is the ability to withstand disruption and rebound quickly a healthy city aims to create a health-supportive environment achieve a good quality of life provide basic sanitation & hygiene needs supply access to health care safe city provides residents with less risks than others related to smart living smart government smart environment smart economy, etc.
